data.text:
I am SO proud of these World Changers!! They collected 573 cans to send to Hurricane Dorian victims in the Bahamas!! They did all of the work from bringing in cans, to adding them all up, to recording who brought in each can, while I just watched! 🇧🇸🌎
#WorldChangers #betonus https://t.co/rR8Ra5Uzf5

After a hurricane hits, people rush to help those in need. If you are making a donation for hurricane relief, remember to give enough thought to where exactly you are sending your money. Do your research. Visit https://t.co/hR23nRCNwq to learn more. #HurricaneDorian https://t.co/g4HzBnUz3p

entity.name: Hurricane Dorian: Category 2 expected to make landfall over eastern Canada early Saturday evening

data.text: @TreatYoBrain Right now? A hurricane that won't make up its mind on where it wants to go.
@CambridgeGuy1 I'm willing to try anything to get rid of that monstrous hurricane.
@marysdogwoods Absolutely. You never know what a hurricane is going to do.
And none convening the holiday, Hurricane, or mass shooting. All about Me. https://t.co/5xZ0UOy8Pw
@KellyO None re: Labor Day. Hurricane?

data.text: It was great to assist @PascoSheriff and @WiltonSimpson  in providing sandbags to our residents in the face of a possibly dangerous hurricane. I urge everyone to have a plan and be prepared with Hurricane Dorian only a few days away. #Prepared #Florida #HurricaneDorian https://t.co/rMZHdApM7o

entity.name: President Trump comments on Puerto Rico's disaster aid as Tropical Storm Dorian approaches
entity.description: The US president falsely claimed Puerto Rico has received $92 billion in funding from Congress. Reporters from the Washington Post fact-checked the claim and found $42.7 billion in aid had been allocated to the island as of June 30. Authorities declared a state of emergency for Puerto Rico ahead of Tropical Storm Dorian.

data.text:
If meteorologists could predict w/a certainty what the weather was going to do there'd be no "chance" that it's going to rain, it either would/wouldn't. They're a great help, I'm simply saying be ready just in case. Don't panic, prepare. #HurricaneDorian

https://t.co/GWgFp8rNps

entity.name: World leaders meet at the 2019 G7 Summit in Biarritz, France
entity.description: The 45th annual G7 summit started on August 24 and ends August 26. Leaders from France, Canada, Germany, Italy, Japan, the United Kingdom, the United States and officials from the European Union will attend. This year’s theme will focus on “combating inequality.”

tweets.text: The Clearwater Beach tide gauge recorded its earliest 90+ degree daily seawater reading (24-year period of record) last Thursday, June 6th. The Gulf is en fuego, experiencing its warmest start to a #Hurricane Season since reliable satellite records began in 1981. #Florida #flwx https://t.co/T9yqRrrskQ
